content:
Pinging @Laryn to have a look at this issue
The latest release is .... uh-oh.

Entity Plus and Entity UI define the same named constants · Issue #20 · backdrop-contrib/entity_plus
The entity_plus module uses constants like ENTITY_OVERRIDDEN that are defined by the entity_ui module. Maybe the intention is to move that into core?
I keep forgetting that hosef is @Joseph Flatt here.
Blergh. Will take a look as soon as I get back to the keyboard later today, unless @Joseph Flatt beats me to it.

Aaaaand another problem with that release: https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/entity_plus/issues/39

Latest stable release breaks Metatag functionality · Issue #39 · backdrop-contrib/entity_plus
One of the side effects of release 1.x-1.0.8 is that it prevents Metatag from working. I had to downgrade to entity_plus to 1.x-1.0.7 to get that working again. Could some of the maintainers please...
@indigoxela Can you provide more info on that last one?
